column4: you are likeable and charismatic. You’ve got that “special something” that draws others to you. You often know just the right thing to say to make someone laugh
column6: or spur them to action. People like you
column8: and want to be your friend'

descriptor_description: 'Helping others is your calling. It’s why you’re here. Others delight in your outgoing and charitable nature
column3: and you delight in their happiness. You’re at your best when you’re aiding people
column4: either by explaining how they can best overcome a challenge or by demonstrating how to do so yourself.'
